Title: Provides a premium reduction for physicians and licensed midwives who complete a risk management strategies course
Summary: Provides for a premium reduction for physicians and licensed midwives who complete a risk management strategies course in obstetrics or midwifery.
LawCode: Add ยง2506-a, Pub Health L; amd ยง2343, Ins L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the insurance law, in relation to premium reduction for obstetric practitioners who complete a risk management strategies course
